text:
John Richard Reid (3 June 1928 – 14 October 2020) was a New Zealand cricketer. He was born in Auckland, New Zealand. He played for the national team between 1949 to 1965.
In 1962, Reid was appointed an Officer of the Order of the British Empire.
Reid died in Auckland on 14 October 2020 at the age of 92.

annotations.surface_form: Officer of the Order of the British Empire
